name: Starlight Tactics Unlimited
description:
*** App Store Best New Game of 2015 ***

"In terms of turn based tactics this is very unique. This is the first one of its kind to use 3 dimensions...and it works and functions very well. In fact this is the only true 3d strategy space game that I can think of since Homeworld movement-wise."
"The details are great, especially with the battle. Keep up the good work!"
"I ABSOLUTELY LOVE that I can ram, and/or fire upon my fellow ship(s) if I am not careful."
"The concept of the game is great."
"Saw you guys at PAX...lots of cool details and a great simulation of 3D space combat."

Starlight Tactics puts you in control of a fleet. Build the perfect strike group, keep your starships in good repair, and command the wisely on the field of battle.

*** Starlight Tactics requires at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2. ***

FULL 3D TURN-BASED TACTICAL COMBAT
Every wanted to feel like you were really in space making life or death decisions that will determine the outcome of a war for our Star System?

INTENSE SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGNS
Play through two exciting and immersive fifty mission single player campaigns as you fight amongst beautifully rendered planets in our Star System.

A STORY UNFOLDS WHILE YOU PLAY
You are the center of a story which follows you through the greatest conflict humankind has ever known.

FREEPLAY SKIRMISH MODE
Brush up on your tactical skills as you play against the AI or a human opponent (shared screen experience).

YOU OWN YOUR FLEET
Be careful not to scratch the paint on your space fleet! Destroyers, Stealth Ships, Littoral Combat Ships, Cruisers and Carriers all persist from mission to mission in a SpaceDock where you requisition, rename, repaint, inspect, modify, repair, upgrade and decommission your forces.

PHYSICS MATTER
Smaller ships are hit by weapons that send them off axis. Plasma weapons can be used to hull asteroids toward enemy ships. Or just use your ships as battering rams to cause catastrophic damage!

SOUNDTRACK BY DAVID ARKENSTONE
Three time Grammy nominee and composer of music for World of Warcraft : Cataclysm, David Arkenstone brings his sensational talent to bear on Starlight Tactics, with musical themes to accompany every battle.

The SpaceDock is waiting for you. Get started building your fleet today for FREE.

Requires iOS7 or later. Compatible with iPhone 5 or later, iPad 3 or later, or iPad mini 2 or later. This app is optimized for the latest devices.

This app offers in-app purchases. Please note that you may disable in-app purchasing directly from your device. For more information, visit http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4213.
